name: COME ON Phonics
description: Come On Phonics is a five-level phonics series designed to teach phonics through an easy and child centered approach.   Features A child-centered and easy-to-follow approach allows students to quickly understand each lesson and activity. Fun chants and stories help learners to remember the sounds and meanings of words. A variety of activities give students the opportunity to use what they have learned. Poster-sized board games provide a review of several units together. A DVD-ROM includes animations, games, and audio material to allow in-class or at-home practice.
